name: Have Ranni the Witch kill you
Go into any Boss fight with zero Flasks
Die in Placidusax's arena without starting the fight
Erdtree Greatbow
Use Pyromancy on Fire Giant
Kill Edgar the Revenger
Kill any Boss without them noticing you
Summon at least 2 different Legendary Spirit Ashes
Go through Stormveil's Main Gate
Duplicate any remembrance, then use both copies for runes
Collect 4 Sacred Tears before upgrading your Flask
Go to Jarburg
Jump from one Spiritspring into another
Use every kind of Boluses
Attack Fire Giant with a Torch
Kill 20 Ants
Lose at least 20,000 Runes by dying before getting them from a previous death
Erdtree Bow
Kill Rennala with a spell
Pop a Pop a Hero's Rune of any number
Get killed in a Spiritcaller Snail boss fight
Founding Rain of Stars
Kill 5 Night's Cavalry
Get Deathblighted in the Lake of Rot
Arrow's Reach Talisman
